author: Merrilees Parker
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Toss all the ingredients together in a large bowl. Tip on to a roasting tray or use a large terracotta dish. Cook in the oven for 20-25 minutes tossing frequently. Drain well on kitchen paper before serving. They may need a little more salt so have a taste before serving.
ingredients: 350g/12oz organic whole almonds with the skin on,  3 tbsp light olive oil,  1 tsp cayenne ,  1 tsp paprika,  1 tbsp Maldon sea salt,  1 tsp freshly ground black pepper
